title: Thunderbird Email via Spectrum
content: Sorry to once again send a follow up email for help. But, I'm still unable to get Thunderbird email to cooperate and download any new email messages. Have tried various troubleshooting methods and nothing seems to work. Can you kindly advise/help? Any help would be so appreciated.
creator: greenemachine

title: Problem with sending messages
content: Since last week, with no change in settings, I cannot send any messages and get the note: "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.aueb.gr failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again." I've contacted my server host and they told me to change settings, but the issue persists. I am sending you my smtp server configurations (2 consecutive- none works) , antivirus version and thunderbird version. I am using windows 10. What else can I do?
creator: eleanag

title: zapoměl jsem hlavní heslo Thundebiru a nemohu se dostat k svým e-mailům
content: v práci mi nařídili změnit hesla a já zapoměl to nové od thundebirdu. potřebuji se však přihlásit abych mohl efektivně pracovat. nevíte jak změnit, zrušit, restartovat či jinak se změnit/smazat heslo? děkuji za odpověď a rád se zvámi po internetu spojím (steam, jitsi...)

title: Correos respondidos o reenviados no se guardan en bandeja enviados
content:
Buenos días, les escribo porque parte parte del personal que trabaja en esta empresa tiene problemas con el gestor de correo Thunderbird. Se trata de que cuando responden o reenvían un email este no se guarda como enviados de esta forna les surgen dudas de si el mensaje a sido o no enviado.

Hemos revisado la configuración de reenvío y respuesta y esta correctamente y no sabemos a que puede deverse, le sucede a varias personas.

Son cuentas corporativas.
creator: dsoled

title: I can't open attachments from one mail box
content:
Hello,


I just saw that i can not open attachments from one mail box any more. I can open them on my phone but not on pc with Thunderbird. I can open them through a web browser. What more, i can send emails to gmail box and open attachments but when i send attachments from gmail to that mail box i can not open them through Thunderbird.

How can i solve that problem?

Best regards, Wojciech.
creator: commonlynx

title: question - Portable Thunderbird, emails' location, out of my depth, two questions
content:
Hello

As a beginner, I suppose I'm out of my depth, please forgive my ignorance

I've searched online, but all the info I've been able to find seem to be about Thunderbird's desktop version, and not the portable one.

So, here are my two ignorant questions::

1) in which folder are Portable Thunderbird's emails kept?? 2) what is/are the name(s) of the relevant file(s)??

In advance, thank you for your kind help

Christian

title: Drafts folder
content: The drafts folder wont load and prompts a notification that reads "connection to server imap.netfirms.com timed out" after 15 or so seconds. All the other folders load immediately and there is no issue sending and receiving emails. There are only 3 emails in the drafts folder and there is no issue loading the drafts folder through roundcube email so the problem seems to be with thunderbird.
